text: Wait for Me () is a 1943 Soviet war drama movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper and Boris Ivanov.Кинотеатрам бесплатно предоставят фильмы о Великой Отечественной войнеЖди меня (1943) It stars Boris Blinov, Valentina Serova, and Lev Sverdlin. ==Actors== * Boris Blinov as Nikolai Yermolov * Valentina Serova as Lisa * Lev Sverdlin as Misha Weinstein * Mikhail Nazvanov as Andrei Panov * Nina Zorskaya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1943 drama movies Category:1943 war movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper Category:Movies directed by Boris Ivanov
title: Wait for Me (movie)
